response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this product into your life soon.", "product_price": 12000}
